channel.title: Python on Colton Eakins
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Colton Eakins

item.title: B.O.T. Bot
item.description: B.O.T. Bot is a website spider that uses the Scrapy framework. It is specific to legacy websites from 3 affiliates of Internet Brands. The program uses advanced website scraping techniques and several APIs. The program solves a major problem because it drastically cut down the time it takes to upgrade sites from legacy systems to their more modern counterparts. Highlights: Python-based, Cross-Platform (Runs on Windows, MacOS, and Linux), Asynchronous Networking, User-Friendly GUI

item.title: Stargazer
item.description: Stargazer uses APIs provided by ProPublica and GuideStar. It acquires contact information for nonprofit organizations based on a keyword search. The program conveniently exports the information into various formats. It was created for a fundraising company to acquire leads. Highlights: APIs, Text User Interface, Python
